text: Om Birla (born 23 November 1962) is an Indian politician. He is the 17th and current Speaker of the Lok Sabha since 2019. He has been a Member of Parliament for the Kota-Bundi constituency in Rajasthan since 2014. He is a member of the Bharatiya Janata Party. ==References== Category:1962 births Category:Living people Category:Speakers of the Lok Sabha Category:Rajasthani politicians
title: Om Birla
